Did I Win?

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Using this gambling poll aggregator you will no longer have to juggle all your various NFL pool cards, using this simple app you will be able to keep all your pools together in a single place and check your bets in a single place in real time.
